member.name: T:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile
member.summary: Creates toast, tile, and badge updater objects specific to Sim1 and Sim2 on dual sim devices.

member.name: P:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets or sets a name that is associated with and displayed on the tile.

member.name: P:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.IsPinnedToStart
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the tile is pinned to Start.
member.returns: Set to True if the tile is pinned; otherwise, False.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.CreateAsync
member.summary: Creates a new dual SIM app list entry.
member.returns: When this async operation completes a boolean is returned.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.CreateBadgeUpdaterForSim1
member.summary: Creates and initializes a badge updater for the Sim1 tile.
member.returns: The object you will use to send badge updates to the tile.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.CreateBadgeUpdaterForSim2
member.summary: Creates and initializes a badge updater for the Sim2 tile.
member.returns: The object you will use to send badge updates to the tile.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.CreateTileUpdaterForSim1
member.summary: Creates and initializes a tile updater for the Sim1 tile.
member.returns: The object you will use to send updates to the tile.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.CreateTileUpdaterForSim2
member.summary: Creates and initializes a tile updater for the Sim2 tile.
member.returns: The object you will use to send badge updates to the tile.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.CreateToastNotifierForSim1
member.summary: Creates and initializes a toast notifier for Sim1.
member.returns: The object you will use to send the toast notification.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.CreateToastNotifierForSim2
member.summary: Creates and initializes a toast notifier for Sim2.
member.returns: The object you will use to send the toast notification to the app.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.DeleteAsync
member.summary: Deletes a dual SIM app list entry.
member.returns: When this async operation completes a boolean is returned.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.GetTileForSim2
member.returns: A reference to the Sim2 tile.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.UpdateAsync
member.summary: Updates a dual SIM app list entry.
member.returns: When this async operation completes a boolean is returned.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.DualSimTile.UpdateDisplayNameForSim1Async(System.String)
member.summary: Updates the primary tile display name.
member.returns: When this async operation completes a boolean is returned.

member.name: T:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.IToastNotificationManagerStatics3
member.summary: Creates ToastNotifier objects that can be used to raise toast notifications.

member.name: M:Windows.Phone.StartScreen.IToastNotificationManagerStatics3.CreateToastNotifierForSecondaryTile(System.String)
member.summary: Creates and initializes a toast notifier for the secondary tile.
member.returns: The object you will use to send the toast notification to the tile.
